concept.title: Associating DPFs with Data Collections
concept.shortdesc: Data Processing Functions are associated with a data collection during data collection configuration.

conbody.p: A DPF is associated with a data collection as part of data collection configuration. To associate the DPF with the data collection you upload the DPF archive on the data collection configuration page.

includes a library of helper functions to simplify DPF development. DPFs can be developed in either Java or Python, or can be extended to support DPF development in any modern programming language that runs on a Linux OS. No MapReduce or YARN knowledge is necessary.
